name: Shadow Love (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Advergame made for the release of the song Shadow Love by Andreww starring as the game character. You just have to help him reaching the end of the song and defeat final evil boss, going through all different enemies and obstacles try to collect more items as possible to make an high score... with no fear if you can :)

PC CONTROLS

Arrow Keys ⬅  ➡ to move and ⬆ to jump

CREDITS

ARTIST - Andreww

SONG - Shadow love

CARTRIDGE DESIGN - Sebastian Broedner

GAME DEVELOPER - Claudio Cimini

listen on spotify!

https://open.spotify.com/album/0b7FkILM9CurQJR3CKCJmG
